items.title: Who is Robert Prevost, the new Pope Leo XIV?
items.description: Pope Leo XIV has supported his predecessor and focus will turn on whether he continues Church reforms.

items.title: Xi shows he wants to be close to Putin - but not too close
items.description: The relationship between China and Russia is no longer one of equals.

items.title: Three things we learned from Putin's Red Square parade
items.description: BC Monitoring's Russia Editor Vitaly Shevchenko reflects on the Victory Day spectacle in Moscow.

items.title: Pope Leo XIV calls Church 'a beacon to illuminate dark nights' in first mass
items.description: Chicago-born Robert Prevost, 69, is the first North American to be elected pontiff.

items.title: Ukraine arrests two over alleged Hungarian spy plot
items.description: Ukraine's security service says the state-backed spy network sought to obtain information about military defences on its border with Hungary.
